TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ListControl

summary.span: 表示用于显示项列表的 Windows 控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows control to display a list of items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制，你可以向用户可以通过单击选择的用户显示的项的列表。The control enables you to display a list of items to the user that the user can select by clicking. A控件可以提供一个或多个选择使用属性。A control can provide single or multiple selections using the property. 还提供了属性以支持的项的项而不是直接垂直列表的列中显示。The also provides the property to enable the display of items in columns instead of a straight vertical list of items. 与此操作，该控件可以显示更多可见项和用户不再需要滚动到某项。With this, the control can display more visible items and the user no longer needs to scroll to an item. 通常，Windows 会处理绘制要在中显示的项的任务。Typically, Windows handles the task of drawing the items to display in the . 你可以使用属性，并处理和事件以便您可以重写绘制 Windows 自动提供和自己绘制项。You can use the property, and handle the and events so you can override the automatic drawing that Windows provides and draw the items yourself. 你可以使用所有者描述控件以显示在列表中的高度可变的项、 图像或不同的颜色或每个项的文本的字体。You can use owner-drawn controls to display variable-height items, images, or a different color or font for the text of each item in the list. 属性， ，和还有助于在绘制自己的项目。The property, , and also help you draw your own items. 显示和选择功能，除了还提供功能，您可以有效地将项添加到并查找的项列表中的文本。In addition to display and selection functionality, the also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the and to find text within the items of the list. 和方法使你能够添加大量的项到而无需每次都重新绘制控件项添加到列表。The and methods enable you to add a large number of items to the without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list. 和方法使你能够搜索包含特定的搜索字符串的列表中的项。The and methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string. ， ，和属性提供对由三个集合的访问。The , , and properties provide access to the three collections that are used by the . 下表概述了使用的三个集合控件内及其用法。The following table outlines the three collections used by the and their use within the control. |集合类Collection class|使用中 Use within the | |----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||包含中包含的所有项控件。Contains all items contained in the control.| ||包含选定项的集合，这是包含的项的子集在控件。Contains a collection of the selected items which is a subset of the items contained in the control.| ||包含一套所选的索引，这是索引的子集的。Contains a collection of the selected indexes, which is a subset of the indexes of the . 这些索引指定选定项。These indexes specify items that are selected.| 以下三个示例显示三个索引的集合类支持。The following three examples show the three indexed collections that the class supports. 下表显示如何的示例中存储的项示例中其所选内容状态以及。The following table shows an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection state within an example . |索引Index|项Item|列表框中选择状态Selection state within the ListBox| |-----------|----------|----------------------------------------| |00|object1object1|未选定Unselected| |11|object2object2|已选定Selected| |22|object3object3|未选定Unselected| |33|object4object4|已选定Selected| |44|object5object5|已选定Selected| 基于上表中所示，此表显示如何将出现。Based on the shown in the previous table, this table shows how the would appear. |索引Index|项Item| |-----------|----------| |00|object2object2| |11|object4object4| |22|object5object5| 基于上表中所示，此表显示如何将出现。Based on the shown in the previous table, this table shows how the would appear. |索引Index|项的索引Index of item| |-----------|-------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| 方法类使你能够将项添加到。The method of the class enables you to add items to the . 方法可以接受任何对象时向其中添加成员。The method can accept any object when adding a member to the . 当一个对象将被添加到，该控件使用中定义的文本对象方法除非内对象的成员名中指定属性。When an object is being added to the , the control uses the text defined in the method of the object unless a member name within the object is specified in the property. 除了使用添加项目方法类还可以添加项使用属性类。In addition to adding items using the method of the class you can also add items using the property of the class. > [!NOTE] > 如果你有， ，或必须在基的 Windows 窗体和想要修改这些控件派生的 Windows 窗体中的字符串集合，这些基本的 Windows 窗体中的控件的字符串集合为空。If you have a , , or on a base Windows form and want to modify the string collections of those controls in a derived Windows form, the string collections of those controls in the base Windows form must be empty. 如果不为空字符串集合，这些变为只读派生另一个 Windows 窗体时。If the string collections are not empty, they become read-only when you derive another Windows form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建列中显示多个项，并且可以有多个项在控件的列表中选择的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that displays multiple items in columns and can have more than one item selected in the control's list. 该示例的代码添加到 50 个项使用方法类，然后选择三个项从列表使用方法。The code for the example adds 50 items to the using the method of the class and then selects three items from the list using the method. 然后，该代码显示中的值集合，通过属性，与，直到属性。The code then displays values from the collection, through the property, and the , through the property. 此示例需要的代码是位于并从调用。This example requires that the code is located in and called from a . summary.span: 当向 中一次添加一个项时，通过防止该控件绘图来维护性能，直到调用 方法为止。

span.span: Maintains performance while items are added to the one at a time by preventing the control from drawing until the method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加到多个项的首选的方法是使用方法类 (通过属性)。The preferred way to add multiple items to the is to use the method of the class (through the property of the ). 这使您可以向单个操作中的列表添加项的数组。This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation. 但是，如果你想要添加项时使用一个方法类，可以使用方法，以防止重新绘制控件每次向列表添加项。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成向列表添加项的任务后，请调用方法，以使重绘窗体。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 这种方法添加项可以防止闪烁的绘制大量的项添加到列表时。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用和方法添加到五千项时。The following code example uses the and methods while adding five thousand items to a . 此示例需要控件，名为`listBox1`，已添加到与，放置在窗体中并从其调用此方法。This example requires that a control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a and that this method is placed within the form and called from it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法等效于设置属性为负一 (-1)。Calling this method is equivalent to setting the property to negative one (-1). 此方法可用于快速取消选择列表中的所有项。You can use this method to quickly unselect all items in the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有属性属性以将当前所选的项移动到中的显示区域的项列表的顶部。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the property to move the currently selected item to the top of the list of items in the display area of the . 该示例还演示了如何删除使用项方法类，以及如何清除所有项选择使用方法。The example further demonstrates how to remove items using the method of the class, and how to clear all item selection using the method. 代码首先移动当前选定的项到列表的顶部。The code first moves the currently selected item in the to the top of the list. 然后，代码中移除当前选定项之前的所有项并清除中的所有选择。The code then removes all items before the currently selected item and clears all selections in the . 此示例需要包含项添加到窗体和项是当前在中选择。This example requires that a containing items is added to a form and that an item is currently selected in the . summary.span: 在所有者绘制的 的可视方位更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件由一个所有者绘制。This event is used by an owner-drawn . 事件才会引发时属性设置为`DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed`或`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`。The event is only raised when the property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed` or `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`. 你可以使用此事件来执行绘制项所需的任务。You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the . 如果你拥有一个可变大小的项 (时属性设置为`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`)，在绘制某一项前,引发事件。If you have a variable-sized item (when the property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`), before drawing an item, the event is raised. 你可以创建的事件处理程序事件，以指定要绘制事件处理程序中的项的大小事件。You can create an event handler for the event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建所有者描述项。The following code example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 该代码使用属性指定绘制的项固定大小和事件以执行到每个项的绘制。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 该示例代码使用的属性和方法类作为参数传递给事件处理程序来绘制项。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 此示例需要控件称为`listBox1`已添加到窗体，由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序处理事件。This example requires that a control called `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code. 该示例还要求项已添加到包括"Apple"、"橙色"和"Plum"按此顺序的文本。The example also requires that items have been added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将项添加到的首选的方式是使用方法类 (通过属性)。The preferred way to add items to the is to use the method of the class (through the property of the ). 这使您可以一次向列表添加项的数组。This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time. 但是，如果你想要添加项时使用一个方法类，可以使用方法，以防止重新绘制控件每次向列表添加项。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成向列表添加项的任务后，请调用方法，以使重绘窗体。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 这种方法添加项可以防止闪烁的绘制大量的项添加到列表时。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用和方法添加到五千项时。The following code example uses the and methods while adding five thousand items to a . 此示例需要控件，名为`listBox1`，已添加到与，放置在窗体中并从其调用此方法。This example requires that a control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a and that this method is placed within the form and called from it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. 搜索查找与指定的搜索字符串参数，部分匹配的单词`s`。The search looks for words that partially match the specified search string parameter, `s`. 此方法可用于搜索与指定的字符串匹配的第一项。You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string. 然后，你可以执行任务，例如删除通过使用包含搜索文本的项方法或更改项的文本。You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the method or changing the item's text. 一旦你找到指定的文本，如果你想要搜索的文本中的其他实例，你可以使用的版本指定内的起始索引为提供一个参数的方法。Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the , you can use the version of the method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the . 如果你想要执行搜索而不是部分匹配的确切的单词匹配，则使用方法。If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法搜索中的字符串的第一个实例。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to search for the first instance of a string in a . 如果未找到项时与搜索字符串相匹配返回-1 值，该示例显示。If no items are found that match the search string returns a -1 value and the example displays a . 如果匹配的搜索文本找到的项，该示例使用方法来选择中的项。If an item is found that matches the search text, the example uses the method to select the item in the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. 搜索查找与指定的搜索字符串参数，部分匹配的单词`s`。The search looks for words that partially match the specified search string parameter, `s`. 你可以使用此方法要搜索匹配项的列表中指定的起始索引处的指定的字符串的第一项。You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string at the specified starting index within the list of items for the . 然后，你可以执行任务，例如删除通过使用包含搜索文本的项方法或更改项的文本。You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the method or changing the item's text. 使用此方法的未指定起始索引版本建立调用之后，通常使用此方法。This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index. 在列表中找到的初始项后, 此方法通常用于通过指定中的索引位置查找进一步的搜索文本实例`startIndex`的搜索文本的第一个找到实例之后的项的参数。Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text. 如果你想要执行搜索而不是部分匹配的确切的单词匹配，则使用方法。If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 当搜索到达底部，它将继续按自上而下的搜索回由指定的项`startIndex`参数。When the search reaches the bottom of the , it continues searching from the top of the back to the item specified by the `startIndex` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法搜索中的项的搜索文本的所有实例。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to search for all instances of the search text in the items of the . 此示例使用的版本方法，可用于指定从其执行中的所有项持续搜索的起始搜索索引。The example uses the version of the method that enables you to specify a starting search index from which to do a continual search of all items in the . 该示例还演示如何确定何时方法开始后到达要阻止的递归搜索的项列表的底部，从列表的顶部搜索。The example also demonstrates how to determine when the method begins searching from the top of the list after it reaches the bottom of the list of items to prevent a recursive search. 在找到项后，它们使用选择方法。Once items are found in the , they are selected using the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性只报告有用的值，如果属性设置为`true`。This property only reports a useful value if the property is set to `true`. 如果宽度小于此属性，则水平滚动条在水平滚动项的值。If the width of the is smaller than the value of this property, the horizontal scroll bar horizontally scrolls items in the . 如果宽度等于或大于此值，将会隐藏水平滚动条。If the width of the is equal to or greater than this value, the horizontal scroll bar is hidden. 此属性的值不会通过动态更新。The value of this property is not dynamically updated by the . 当此属性很有用的项是所有者描述。This property is useful when the items of the are owner-drawn. 例如，如果所有者描述的项是 200 像素宽，但为 60 个像素宽，属性需要将设置为 200 以滚动到控件的可见区域的项的右边缘。For example, if the owner drawn items of the are 200 pixels wide, but the is 60 pixels wide, the property would need to be set to 200 in order to scroll the right edge of the items into the visible region of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和属性，以显示水平滚动条的显示中的所有项文本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to display a horizontal scroll bar that shows all item text in the control. 此示例还使用属性以确保项未部分显示的大小由于控件。The example also uses the property to ensure that items are not partially displayed due to the size of the control. 此示例需要控件，名为`listBox1`，已添加到表单。This example requires that a control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可确定哪一项位于控件内的特定位置。This method enables you to determine which item is located at a specific location within the control. 你可以使用此方法来确定哪些项列表中的选择了当用户右键单击。You can use this method to determine which item within the list is selected when a user right-clicks the . 可以确定光标的位置，并将其传递给`p`参数方法来确定用户的哪一项之前通过右键单击鼠标。The location of the cursor can be determined and passed to the `p` parameter of the method to determine which item the user right-clicked the mouse over. 然后可以为用户提供任务和基于特定项的功能来显示快捷菜单。You can then display a shortcut menu to the user to provide tasks and features based on the specific item. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何执行拖放操作使用包含用于放到项的控件控件。The following code example demonstrates how to perform drag-and-drop operations using a control that contains items to drop into a control. 表单集的构造函数属性`true`启用拖放操作中发生。The constructor of the form sets the property to `true` to enable drag-and-drop operations to occur in the . 该示例使用事件启动拖动操作，通过调用方法。The example uses the event of the to start the drag operation by calling the method. 该示例使用事件来确定是否项拖放到是有效的数据类型。The example uses the event to determine if an item being dragged into the is a valid data type. 事件执行拖动的项到实际删除内当前光标位置处的控件。The event performs the actual dropping of a dragged item into the control at the current cursor location within the . 此示例需要和事件已连接到示例中定义的事件处理程序。This example requires that the and events have been connected to the event handlers defined in the example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`true`，该控件自动调整大小以确保不部分显示项。When this property is set to `true`, the control automatically resizes to ensure that an item is not partially displayed. 如果你想要维护的原始大小基于窗体的空间要求，将此属性设置为`false`。If you want to maintain the original size of the based on the space requirements of your form, set this property to `false`. 默认情况下，和大小是这样的： 它们仅显示整个项目。By default, the and the sizes are such that they show only whole items. 如果你想或若要完全填充的停靠的区域，设置到`false`。If you want the or to completely fill a docked area, set to `false`. 这将使控件以完全填充区域，但没有完全显示的最后一项。This causes the control to completely fill the area, but the last item is not fully displayed. 如果不包含任何项，此属性不起作用。If the does not contain any items, this property has no effect. > [!NOTE] > 整体高度基于高度，而不是工作区的高度。The integral height is based on the height of the , rather than the client area height. 因此，当属性设置`true`，项仍可部分显示是否显示滚动条。As a result, when the property is set `true`, items can still be partially shown if scroll bars are displayed. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`，此属性不起作用。If the property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, this property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和属性，以显示水平滚动条的显示中的所有项文本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to display a horizontal scroll bar that shows all item text in the control. 此示例还使用属性以确保项未部分显示的大小由于控件。The example also uses the property to ensure that items are not partially displayed due to the size of the control. 此示例需要控件，名为`listBox1`，已添加到表单。This example requires that a control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够获取对当前存储中的项列表的引用。This property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in the . 通过此引用，可以将项添加、 删除项，并获取集合中项的计数。With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection. 有关可以与项集合执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅类参考主题。For more information about the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the class reference topics. 您还可以操作的项使用属性。You can also manipulate the items of a by using the property. 如果你使用属性将项添加到，你可以查看中的项使用属性，但你无法添加或使用的方法从列表中删除项。If you use the property to add items to a , you can view the items in the using the property but you cannot add or remove items from the list using the methods of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建列中显示多个项，并且可以有多个项在控件的列表中选择的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that displays multiple items in columns and can have more than one item selected in the control's list. 该示例的代码添加到 50 个项使用方法类，然后选择三个项从列表使用方法。The code for the example adds 50 items to the using the method of the class and then selects three items from the list using the method. 然后，该代码显示中的值集合 (通过属性) 和(通过属性)。The code then displays values from the collection (through the property) and the (through the property). 此示例需要的代码是位于并从调用。This example requires that the code is located in and called from a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建所有者描述项。The following code example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 该代码使用属性指定绘制的项固定大小和事件以执行到每个项的绘制。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 该示例代码使用的属性和方法类作为参数传递给事件处理程序来绘制项。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 此示例需要控件称为`listBox1`已添加到窗体，由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序处理事件。This example requires that a control called `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code. 该示例还要求项已添加到包括"Apple"、"橙色"和"Plum"按此顺序的文本。The example also requires that items have been added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order. [!code-csharp[ListBox.DrawMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.DrawMode/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.DrawMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.DrawMode/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否始终显示垂直滚动条，即使中的项的数目不需要显示垂直滚动条。The property indicates whether a vertical scroll bar is always displayed, even if the number of items in the does not require displaying the vertical scroll bar. 默认情况下，在有足够一定要显示的项时，只显示垂直滚动条。By default, a only shows a vertical scroll bar when there are enough items to warrant displaying. 对于多列、属性指示是否显示水平滚动条。For a multicolumn , the property indicates that a horizontal scroll bar is displayed. 垂直滚动条计算机对于多列而不考虑此属性的值将永远不会显示。A vertical scroll bar is never displayed regardless of the value of this property for a multicolumn . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个所有者绘制通过设置属性`OwnerDrawVariable`值和处理和事件。The following code example demonstrates an owner-drawn by setting the property to the `OwnerDrawVariable` value and handling the and events. 它还演示如何设置和属性，并使用方法。It also demonstrates setting the and properties and using the method. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴在导入的空窗体命名空间和命名空间。To run this example, paste it in an empty form that imports the namespace and the namespace. 调用`InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox`从窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法。Call `InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. summary.span: 获取或设置 中当前选定项的从零开始的索引。

value.span: 如果未选定任何项，则返回值为负一 (-1)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于标准，你可以使用此属性来确定在选定的项的索引。For a standard , you can use this property to determine the index of the item that is selected in the . 如果属性设置为`SelectionMode.MultiSimple`或`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`(指示多选) 并在列表中选择多个项目，此属性可以返回任意选定项的索引。If the property of the is set to either `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` or `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` (which indicates a multiple-selection ) and multiple items are selected in the list, this property can return the index to any selected item. 若要检索包含的所有索引的集合在多重选择中选择项目，使用属性。To retrieve a collection containing the indexes of all selected items in a multiple-selection , use the property. 如果你想要获取中当前选定的项，使用属性。If you want to obtain the item that is currently selected in the , use the property. 此外，你可以使用属性来获取多个选定内容中所有选定的项目。In addition, you can use the property to obtain all the selected items in a multiple-selection . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有属性属性以将当前所选的项移动到中的显示区域的项列表的顶部。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the property to move the currently selected item to the top of the list of items in the display area of the . 该示例还演示了如何删除使用项方法类，以及如何清除所有项选择使用方法。The example further demonstrates how to remove items using the method of the class, and how to clear all item selection using the method. 代码首先移动当前选定的项到列表的顶部。The code first moves the currently selected item in the to the top of the list. 然后，代码中移除当前选定项之前的所有项并清除中的所有选择。The code then removes all items before the currently selected item and clears all selections in the . 此示例需要包含项添加到窗体和项是当前在中选择。This example requires that a containing items is added to a form and that an item is currently selected in the . summary.span: 在 属性或 集合更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property or the collection has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以创建此事件来确定一个事件处理程序中的所选的索引已更改。You can create an event handler for this event to determine when the selected index in the has been changed. 这一点可能很有用，当您需要在基于中的当前选择其他控件中显示信息时。This can be useful when you need to display information in other controls based on the current selection in the . 可以使用此事件的事件处理程序以加载其他控件中的信息。You can use the event handler for this event to load the information in the other controls. 如果属性设置为或，对进行任何更改集合，包括删除某个项从所选内容，将引发此事件。If the property is set to or , any change to the collection, including removing an item from the selection, will raise this event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件来搜索并选择在不同的一项控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to search for and select an item in a different control. 该示例使用事件来确定何时中的选定的项更改。The example uses the event to determine when the selected item in the is changed. 然后，代码示例将读取的项使用的文本属性和调用方法在其他使用返回的文本中第一个。The example code then reads the text of the item using the property and calls the method on a different using the text returned by in the first . 如果另一部分中找到的项，选定了项。If an item is found in the other , the item is selected. 此示例要求将两个控件，名为`listBox1`和`listBox2`，已添加到窗体，同时控件包含相同的项。This example requires that two controls, named `listBox1` and `listBox2`, have been added to a form and that both controls contain items that are identical. 该示例还要求该示例中定义的事件处理方法已连接到事件`listBox1`。The example also requires that the event-handling method defined in the example is connected to the event of `listBox1`. [!code-cpp[ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选择的多个，此属性返回一个包含在中选择的所有项的索引的集合。For a multiple-selection , this property returns a collection containing the indexes to all items that are selected in the . 对于单选择，此属性返回一个包含单个元素包含在唯一选定的项的索引的集合。For a single-selection , this property returns a collection containing a single element containing the index of the only selected item in the . 有关如何操作的集合的项的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about how to manipulate the items of the collection, see . 类提供多种方式来引用所选的项目。The class provides a number of ways to reference selected items. 而不是使用属性来获取当前选定项的索引位置中单项选择，你可以使用属性。Instead of using the property to obtain the index position of the currently selected item in a single-selection , you can use the property. 如果你想要获取中当前选定的项，而不是项的索引位置，使用属性。If you want to obtain the item that is currently selected in the , instead of the index position of the item, use the property. 此外，你可以使用属性，如果你想要获取多个选定内容中所有选定的项目。In addition, you can use the property if you want to obtain all the selected items in a multiple-selection . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法搜索中的项的搜索文本的所有实例。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to search for all instances of the search text in the items of the . 此示例使用的版本方法，可用于指定从其执行中的所有项持续搜索的起始搜索索引。The example uses the version of the method that enables you to specify a starting search index from which to do a continual search of all items in the . 该示例还演示如何确定何时方法开始后到达要阻止的递归搜索的项列表的底部，从列表的顶部搜索。The example also demonstrates how to determine when the method begins searching from the top of the list after it reaches the bottom of the list of items to prevent a recursive search. 在找到项后，它们使用选择方法。Once items are found in the , they are selected using the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 选择的多个，此属性返回包含在中选择的所有项的集合。For a multiple-selection , this property returns a collection containing all items that are selected in the . 对于单选择，此属性返回一个包含单个元素包含在唯一选定的项的集合。For a single-selection , this property returns a collection containing a single element containing the only selected item in the . 有关如何操作的集合的项的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about how to manipulate the items of the collection, see . 类提供多种方式来引用所选的项目。The class provides a number of ways to reference selected items. 而不是使用属性来获取单项选择中的当前选定的项，你可以使用属性。Instead of using the property to obtain the currently selected item in a single-selection , you can use the property. 如果你想要获取中当前选定的项的索引位置，而不是针对项本身，使用属性。If you want to obtain the index position of an item that is currently selected in the , instead of the item itself, use the property. 此外，你可以使用属性，如果你想要获取所有选定项的索引位置中多选。In addition, you can use the property if you want to obtain the index positions of all selected items in a multiple-selection .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够确定在多少个项可以一次选择用户和用户如何建立多个选择。The property enables you to determine how many items in the a user can select at one time and how the user can make multiple-selections. 当属性设置为`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`、 按下 shift 键并单击鼠标或按 SHIFT 和箭头键 （向上箭头、 向下箭头、 向左键和向右箭头） 之一扩展到当前项从以前选择的项选择范围.When the property is set to `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, pressing SHIFT and clicking the mouse or pressing SHIFT and one of the arrow keys (UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, and RIGHT ARROW) extends the selection from the previously selected item to the current item. 按住 ctrl 键并单击鼠标选择或取消选择列表中的项。Pressing CTRL and clicking the mouse selects or deselects an item in the list. 当属性设置为`SelectionMode.MultiSimple`、 鼠标单击或按空格键选择或取消选择列表中的项。When the property is set to `SelectionMode.MultiSimple`, a mouse click or pressing the SPACEBAR selects or deselects an item in the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来确定中的哪些项才能选择未选定的项，并取消选择选定项选择。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to determine which items in a are selected in order to select the items that are not selected and deselect the items that are selected. 该示例还演示了如何使用属性来启用若要有多个选择项，并使用属性来演示如何在中的项进行排序自动。The example also demonstrates using the property to enable a to have more than one selected item and uses the property to demonstrate how to sort items in a automatically. 此示例需要命名`listBox1`，已添加到窗体，`InitializeMyListBox`示例中定义的方法调用从窗体的事件。This example requires that a , named `listBox1`, has been added to a form and that the `InitializeMyListBox` method defined in the example is called from the event of the form. [!code-cpp[ListBox.GetSelected#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.GetSelected/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBox.GetSelected#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.GetSelected/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.GetSelected#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.GetSelected/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 高度控制增加和减少了的倍数属性。The height of the control increases and decreases by a multiple of the property. 如果高度是一个数字，不是的倍数的高度将更改的最大倍数而小于高度。If height is a number that is not a multiple of , the height of the will change by the largest multiple that is less than height. 通常情况下，随其当前值一起传递的参数对应于指定的参数中未包括的边界。Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the specified parameter are passed in with their current values. 例如， `height`， `width`，或`x`或`y`属性可以随对控件的当前实例的引用传递属性。For example, the `height`, `width`, or the `x` or `y` properties of the property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control. 但是，所有传入的值遵守并应用于控件。However, all values passed in are honored and applied to the control. `specified`参数表示元素的控件更改你的应用程序。The `specified` parameter represents the elements of the controls changed by your application. 例如，如果你更改的控件，`specified`参数值是。For example, if you change the of the control, the `specified` parameter value is . 但是，如果在响应中调整要设置属性`specified`参数值是。However, if the is adjusted in response to the property being set, the `specified` parameter value is .

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以强制要更改的控件的边界。派生的类可以添加到的大小限制方法。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method to force the bounds of the control to change. Derived classes can add size restrictions to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强制回收后，将每个项添加回发到自身，如果属性是`true`。 forces the collection to add each item back to itself if the property is `true`. 每个项会插入到正确的位置。Each item is then inserted into the correct position. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 此示例演示从继承类并重写中派生的类来执行用户定义的排序方法。The example demonstrates inheriting from the class and overriding the method in the derived class to perform a user-defined sort. 若要运行此示例中的空窗体粘贴以下代码。To run this example paste the following code in an empty form. You can override this method in your derived class to provide your own sorting routine. Access the results of the overridden method by setting the property to . When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性进行自动排序字符串按字母顺序在。Use the property to automatically sort strings alphabetically in a . 将项目添加到一个经过排序，项目被移动到已排序的列表中的适当位置。As items are added to a sorted , the items are moved to the appropriate location in the sorted list. 当将项添加到，它是第一次的项进行排序，然后添加新项更加高效。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items. A与其设置为`true`不应绑定到数据使用属性。A with its set to `true` should not be bound to data using the property. 显示排序中的数据绑定，你应将绑定到支持排序的数据源并具有提供的排序的数据源。To display sorted data in a bound , you should bind to a data source that supports sorting and have the data source provide the sorting. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来确定中的哪些项才能选择未选定的项，并取消选择选定项选择。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to determine which items in a are selected in order to select the items that are not selected and deselect the items that are selected. 该示例还演示了如何使用属性来启用若要有多个选择项，并使用属性来演示如何在中的项进行排序自动。The example also demonstrates using the property to enable a to have more than one selected item and uses the property to demonstrate how to sort items in a automatically. 此示例需要命名`listBox1`，已添加到窗体，`InitializeMyListBox`示例中定义的方法调用从窗体的事件。This example requires that a , named `listBox1`, has been added to a form and that the `InitializeMyListBox` method defined in the example is called from the event of the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性的值设置为一个字符串值，中项的搜索的匹配指定的文本，并且选择的项。When the value of this property is set to a string value, the searches for the item within the that matches the specified text and selects the item. 你还可以使用此属性来确定中当前选定的项。You can also use this property to determine which items are currently selected in the . 如果属性设置为`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`，此属性返回的第一个选定项的文本。If the property of the is set to `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, this property returns the text of the first selected item. 如果属性未设置为`SelectionMode.None`，此属性返回的第一个选定项的文本。If the property of the is not set to `SelectionMode.None`, this property returns the text of the first selected item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最初，使用的索引位置的项零 (0) 位于设置的可见区域的顶部。Initially, the item with the index position zero (0) is at the top of the visible region of the . 如果内容已经滚动，另一个项目可能会在控件的显示区域的顶部。If the contents of the have been scrolled, another item might be at the top of the control's display area. 你可以使用此属性获取中的索引为在控件的可见区域的顶部当前所处的项。You can use this property to obtain the index within the for the of the item that is currently positioned at the top of the visible region of the control. 你还可以使用此属性来定位控件的可见区域的顶部列表中的项。You can also use this property to position an item in the list at the top of the visible region of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有属性属性以将当前所选的项移动到中的显示区域的项列表的顶部。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the property to move the currently selected item to the top of the list of items in the display area of the . 该示例还演示了如何删除使用项方法类，以及如何清除所有项选择使用方法。The example further demonstrates how to remove items using the method of the class, and how to clear all item selection using the method. 代码首先移动当前选定的项到列表的顶部。The code first moves the currently selected item in the to the top of the list. 然后，代码中移除当前选定项之前的所有项并清除中的所有选择。The code then removes all items before the currently selected item and clears all selections in the . 此示例需要包含项添加到窗体和项是当前在中选择。This example requires that a containing items is added to a form and that an item is currently selected in the .
